page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ....
page.content: {Iain Hubbard}is a 2nd year pupil at Crieff High School whose father is the{gamekeeper}on Abercairney Estate. Iain spends a lot of his spare time helping his father. They{trap {vermin,}eg. weasels, using special traps which are checked every day. They{shoot foxes}locating them in the beam from a spot light attached to a Land Rover. He has helped to{rear wild {animals,}eg. a weasel, whose mother they shot. It became very tame and was allowed into the house. A fox cub was also reared after its mother was killed. It also was tame and lived in a man-made earth in the garden. It loved chocolate. Iain wants to be a{gamekeeper himself when he leaves school.
